name: latitude
notes: The latitude of the site in the range (-90, 90).

name: longitude
notes: The longitude of the site in the range (-180, 180).

name: system capacity
notes: The nameplate capacity of the photovoltaic system.

name: losses
notes: The total system losses, including all sources, in the range (-5, 99).

name: tilt angle
notes: The tilt angle of the PV surface. Defaults to site latitude.

name: azimuth angle
notes: The azimuth angle of the PV surface.
